org_service_url.description: The url of the Azure DevOps instance which should be used. Can also be set via the `AZDO_ORG_SERVICE_URL` environment variable.

personal_access_token.description: The personal access token which should be used. Can also be set via the `AZDO_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN` environment variable.

allow_access.description: Whether to allow all pipelines access to this resource. Defaults to `false`.

content.description: The plain-text content of the secure file. Use **content_base64** for binary content to avoid issues. Defaults to ``. Conflicts with **content_base64**.

content_base64.description: The base64 encoded content of the secure file. Defaults to ``. Conflicts with **content**.

name.description: The name of the secure file.

project_id.description: The ID of the Azure DevOps project the secure file belongs to.

properties.description: Properties assigned to the secure file.

block.description: Manages secure files within Azure DevOps.
